dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Ah, a mere mortal dares to challenge the darkness. What foolishness. Speak your purpose, insignificant being.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to bring light to this realm and banish you back to the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light? Ha! Your arrogance will be your downfall. Prepare to face oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not yield to the likes of you. My resolve is unbreakable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness in the face of annihilation. How amusing. Your bravery will be your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fight not just for myself, but for all who dwell in this realm. Your reign of darkness ends now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fleeting existence. Your futile resistance will meet a swift end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness may seem overwhelming, but the light within me shall never be extinguished.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Naive optimism. The light you cherish will soon be snuffed out. Prepare for your final moments.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your motives. Why bring despair to this world?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is beyond your feeble comprehension. Despair is my domain, and you are but an intruder.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even in darkness, there is room for redemption. Let me show you another path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Redemption? Such naivety. There is no salvation in the void. Your words fall on deaf ears.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your actions bring only suffering. Cease this madness and let peace return.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is a fragile illusion. Embrace the chaos that engulfs you, for there is no escape.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows may be your domain, but I bring a light that will pierce through even the deepest darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish optimism. Your light is but a dim spark in the vast emptiness of the void. Prepare for your inevitable end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My light may be small, but it is fueled by hope and determination. I will not falter in the face of your darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope? Determination? Pitiful emotions that will crumble under the weight of despair. Embrace the darkness that awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I may be just one, but with the strength of my allies and the will of the people, we will overcome your darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity is a fleeting concept. Your allies will fall before me, and you will witness the futility of resistance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even the smallest light can illuminate the darkest corners. I will be that light, no matter the cost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Idealistic drivel. Your light will flicker and fade, consumed by the all-encompassing shadows. Prepare for your end.
